CodeEditorModel.Text:
Sub OnOpen
' Do initalitation only one time If User.Sta.Initalized Then Exit Sub Else User.Sta.Initalized = True End If
' Subscribe to an update of the user list AddHandler S_Users.OnListUpdate, AddressOf _ListUpdate
' Set change of user to user manager AddHandler Me.List.OnChangeDatas, AddressOf S_Users.ListChange
' Create liste of user Call S_Users.SetList
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Update list viewer from datas in S_Users ''' </summary> Private Sub _ListUpdate Me.List.SetList(S_Users.ListView, S_Users.ListData) End Sub
